contents:
>>没有啊，所以民主党有政治迫害的嫌疑。假新闻不止民主党一方在用，fox news本身就是假新闻出产户，...
Fox news is controlled opposition and not to be totally trusted. The corporate legacy media are mostly fake. Both Democrats and Republicans are corrupt. We need to discern truth ourselves and not rely on fake news narrative. Which is why this news about Trump refusing the "peaceful transition of power" is fake news. Democrats still haven't transferred power peacefully to Trump yet! They are still conducting a coup against Trump, right now. Their corruption will be revealed soon.
